divs: sighting detailson saturday the 4 of august 2007 my wife and i where working on our yard her tending the flowers i the lawn and trees.about 1:30 pm i was on the noth\west side of the house when my wife came w\a glass of lemonade,and we took a break, and started to admire some cloud formations,and tried to find figures in them,(this is our personal game when we travel) also we notice at least six airplanes lining up heading west to lax for landing,some times we see up to nine, all of a sudden from behind a cloud above us, we noticed a metalic silver sphere it was way up cant say how high but it was up there just floathing, i streched my arm and placed nine of my fingers together above the plane flying over us ,when the sphere was above the plane,it looked as big as the tail end of the plane,this lasted about a minute and a half,i ran inside to grab my camera when i came back about forty five seconds later,the sphere was shining like a light bulb,just when i turned my camera on and tried to focus ,it moved so fast in a north\ east direction and dissapeared,by the way it came from the west\ and stood there when first seen,it was a sunny hot day and a few white clouds in the beautiful blue sky , i was exited,so was my wife for i had told her that i had seen a gold colored sphere a few moths back when i was at work in the city of downey about five miles from where we live,this time the two of us got to share this sigthing,this was the fourth or fifth for my wife and the ten plus for me. we have seen the normal cigar ,saucer,a couple of strange shapes , the famous black helicopters with no markings just a red light on the bottom, small super fast lighted objects about the size of a humming bird ,a meteor looked so big ten or more times the size of what is normaly seen, and now the spheres i wish someone will be able to explain all this some day ,while this happens we will continue to glance at the sky whenever possible.thank you for your time,
